grl:ComponentDefinition.grl:Title: CAN Network
grl:ComponentDefinition.grl:Desc: Models a network for protocol Controller Area Network (CAN).

grl:ParamDefinition.grl:Title: Nodes to generate
grl:ParamDefinition.grl:Desc: List of nodes to generate C-code for.

grl:ParamDefinition.grl:Title: Generate files full name
grl:ParamDefinition.grl:Desc: If set to "True" always uses full name for CAN generated C-code. Full name includes network and node name in the file in most of the cases. If set to "False" automatically determine if full names are required (generating more than one node in a given network or multiple networks) or not.
